pull_request.title: Hybrid KEM support
pull_request.body:
(WIP)

Hybrid KEM support for the oqs-provider (#3):
- Combines OQS KEMs with OpenSSL EC-kex
- Uses EVP API for OpenSSL EC-kex
- Wraps hybrid KEM in OpenSSL3 KEM-API
- Extends oqsx.h structures to accomodate KEM and KEX contexts
- Refactoring to use preprocessor for hybrid combinations
- Refactors oqs_test_groups: test iterates over all tls-groups in the oqs-provider

Todos:
- Enable yml-templating for all defined combinations
- Enable more EC-kex (currently only ECX (X25519/X448)
- Document IDs for ECX combinations
- Verify if we want to enable NIST-CAT5/X448 hybrids

pull_request.title: Upstream patch for McEliece __m256i_u issue
pull_request.body: This reverts the local changes to McEliece, adds a upstream patch to fix the __m256i_u issue, and pulls the latest version of McEliece using copy_from_upstream. Pulling from PQClean resolves #940. We still need to do another pull from PQClean to get the latest version of SPHINCS.

repo.name: liboqs
repo.description: C library for prototyping and experimenting with quantum-resistant cryptography

repo.name: liboqs
repo.description: C library for prototyping and experimenting with quantum-resistant cryptography
